attributes.action: Tax payers money should not be used to finance Ethiopian regime who commit atrocities against the Oromo people.
attributes.additional_details:
It is well known that Ethiopia receives Hundreds of Millons of pounds from the UK government every year.
The current Ethiopian regime continues to commit atrocities against the Oromo people. This is supported by the Human rights watch and Amnesty International findings. More than 40000 Oromo prisoners suffer in Ethiopian custody without any trial.
I urge the UK government to immediately stop financing the Ethiopian dectatorial regime who murders innocent Oromo people in Oromia.
